item.title: This ain’t just any hood... it's Anuvahood
item.author: Vishnu Aggarwal,
item.description: So den, mans tinks he’s a top boi MC yeh? Well, despite the common perception that the youth of today all aspire to be the next ‘Nappy’ from N-Dubz, it appears the message from latest urban offering – Anuvahood – is that it’s perfectly acceptable to be ordinary. In a genre where almost every scene …
